front.title: •Captain Khurgee (V)
front.gametext: While aboard Thunderflare, attrition against you is -2 here. Once during your turn, if at a battleground, may peek at top card of opponent's Reserve Deck. If it is a character, may reveal it and opponent loses 1 Force (if it is a Rebel, may also place it on Used Pile).
front.lore: Docking bay security officer. Leader. Honored for bravery aboard the Star Destroyer Thunderflare where he rescued five officers from the wreckage of a shuttle crash.
